Package com.example.bankcards.controller

Interface UserApi

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserController
@RequestMapping("/api/users") public interface UserApi
REST API для управления пользователями системы (доступно только администраторам).

  • Method Details

    • getUsers

      @GetMapping @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") List<UserResponse> getUsers(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") Integer page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") Integer size)

    • getUserById

      @GetMapping("/{userId}") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") UserResponse getUserById(@PathVariable("userId") UUID userId)

    • create

      @PostMapping @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") UUID create(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid UserCreateRequest request)

    • update

      @PutMapping("/{userId}") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") void update(@PathVariable("userId") UUID userId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid UserPasswordUpdateRequest request)

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{userId}") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") void delete(@PathVariable("userId") UUID userId)
